page.title: 15Recreation in Chalton
page.content: The landlord of the Red Lion, has been there 15 years. Rises at 7.15am stops work at 11.30pm.{Summer trade rises by {60%.Regular customers come from Bognor {and Fareham}Famous visitors:Lady Sarah Armstrong Jones and Eugene Frazer. Women's favourite drinks: Old English Wines,men: HSB Bitter.Favourite summer meal: ploughmans, prawn sandwiches; winter: scampi/chips. Children prefer sausage, egg and chips. Two families use the mobile library, but others the main libraries in shopping areas. Favourite authors: Tolkien, Trollope, Du Maurier, George Eliot, Frederick Forsyte. Adults listed gardening/DIY as interests, with reading,theatre and entertaining and TV as pasttimes. One farmer's wife breeds Shire horses as a hobby. Two adults belong to historical society. Children members of Cubs, Brownies and Guids.
